data.title: 16 Popular Indian Patriotic Songs For Kids In English
data.meta_description: Motivate your children & make them feel responsible citizens of the country. For this, the first step is to teach them these popular Indian Patriotic songs.
data.text:
India attained freedom almost after 200 years of British rule. Thousands of freedom fighters laid down their lives for the cause of India’s independence. If you are looking for Indian patriotic songs for kids, you are at the right place. Patriotic songs express the love and respect for the country and serve as tributes to the national heroes who put their country before themselves. Many of the Indian patriotic songs have inspired people to join the freedom movement and strengthened the unity of the country. In this post, we have combined a list of patriotic songs that will inspire your kid.

16 Indian Patriotic Songs For Kids With Lyrics

1. Aye Mere Watan Ke Logo

This song is dedicated to Indian soldiers who laid their lives in the Sino-Indian war in 1962. It was sung by the great singer, Lata Mangeshkar. It teaches kids about the sacrifices made for the nation.

Lyrics

Aye mere watan ke logo

Tumkhoob laga lo nara

Yeh subh din hain hum sabka

Leheron tiranga pyara

Pat mat bhoolon seema par

Veeron ne pran gawai

Kuch yaad unhe bhi kar lo

Kuch yaad unhe bhi kar lo

Jo laut ke ghar na aaye

Jo laut ke ghar na aaye

Aye mere watan ke logo

Zara aankh mein bhar lo paani

Jo shahid hue hain unki

Zara yaad karo qurbaani

Aye mere watan ke logo

Zara aankh mein bhar lo paani

Jo shahid hue hain unki

Zara yaad karo qurbaani

Jab ghayal hua Himalaya

Khatre mein padi aazadi

Jab tak thi saans lade woh

Jab tak thi saans lade woh

Phir apne laash bichadi

Sangeen Pe dhar kar maatha

So gaye amar balidani

Jo shahid hue hain unki

Zara yaad karo qurbaani

Jab desh mein thi Diwali

Woh khel rahe the Holi

Jab hum baithe the gharon mein

Woh jhel rahe the goli

The dhanya javaan vo apne

Thi dhanya vo unki javaani

Jo shahid hue hain unki

Zara yaad karo qurbaani

Koi Sikh, Koi Jatt, Maratha

Koi Sikh, Koi Jatt, Maratha

Koi Gurkha koi Madrasi

Koi Gurkha koi Madrasi

Sarhad par marne wala

Sarhad par marne wala

Har veer bharatwasi

Jo khoon gira parvat par

Woh khon tha hindustani

Jo shahid hue hain unki

Zara yaad karo qurbaani

Thi khoon se lathpath kaaya

Phir banduk utha ke

Das das ko ek ne maara

Phir gir gaye hosh gawake

Jab ant samay aaya to

Jab ant samay aaya to

Keh gaye ke ab marte hain

Jab ant samay aaya to

Keh gaye ke ab marte hain

Khush rehna desh ke pyaron

Khush rehna desh ke pyaron

Ab hum to safar karte hain

Ab hum to safar karte hain

Kya log the woh dewane

Kya log the woh abhimani

Jo shaheed hue hain unki

Jara yaad karo qurbaani

Tum bhool na jaao unko

Is liye kahi yeh kahani

Jo shaheed hue hain unki

Zara yaad karo qurbaani

Jai Hind, jai Hind ki sena

Jai Hind, jai Hind ki sena

Jai Hind, jai Hind, jai Hind

2. Bharat Humko Jaan Se Pyaara Hai

This song is from the movie ‘Roja,’ which revolves around the Kashmir issue and is dedicated to the motherland.

Lyrics

Bharat humko jaan se pyaaraa hai

Sabase nyaaraa gulistaan hamara hai

Bharat humko jaan se pyaaraa hai

Sabase nyaaraa gulistaan hamara hai

Sadiyon se Bharat bhuumi duniyaa ki shaan hai

Bharat maan ki rakshaa mein jeevan qurbaan hai

Bharat humko jaan se pyaara hai

Sabase nyaaraa gulistaan hamaaraa hai

Ujade nahin apanaa chaman

Tute nahn apanaa watan

Gumraah na karde koi

Barabaad naa karade koi

Mandir yahaan, Masjid yahaan

Hindu yahaan Muslim yahaan

Milate rahe ham pyaar se

Jaago…..

Hindustani naam hamara hai

Sabase pyaaraa desh hamara hai

Hindustaani naam hamara hai

Sabase pyaaraa desh hamara hai

Janmabhuumi hai hamari shaan se kahenge hum

Sabh to bhaai bhaai pyaar se rahenge ham

Hindustaani naam hamara hai

Sabase pyaaraa desh hamara hai

Assam se Gujarat tak

Bengal se Maharashtra tak

Jaati kai – dhun ek hai

Bhasha kai – sure ek hai

Kashmir se Madras tak

Keh do sabhi ham ek hain

Aawaaz do ham ek hain

Jagoo………..

3. Maa Tujhe Salaam

This song is dedicated to the future generations of India and inspires them to grow up with the ethics of the nation.

Lyrics

Yahan vahan saara jahan dekh liya hai

Kahin bhi tere jaisa koi nahi hai

Assi nahin, sau din duniya ghooma hai

Naahi kaahe tere jaisa koi nahin

Main gaya jahan bhi, bas teri yaadh thi

Jo mere saath thi mujhko tadpa thi rulati

Sab se pyaari teri soorat

Pyaar hai bas tera, pyaar hi

Maa tujhe salaam, maa tujhe salaam

Amma tujhe salaam

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Janam janam thera hoon deewana main

Jhoomoon naachoon gaaoon tere pyaar ka taraana main

Chanda nahi suraj nahi duniya ki daulat nhi bas lootunga

tere pyaar ka khazaana

Ek nazar jab teri hoti hai pyaar ki

Duniya tab to meri chamke damke maheke re

Tera chehra sooraj jaisa chaand si thand hai pyaar mein

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Tere paas hi main aa raha hoon

Apni baahein khol de

Zor se mujhko gale laga le

Mujhko phir voh pyaar de

Tu hi zindagi hai, tu hi meri mohabbat hai

Tere hi pairon mein jannat hai

Tu hi dil, tu jaan, amma

Maa tujhe salaam, maa tujhe salaam

Amma tujhe salaam, maa tujhe salaam

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

Vande Mataram, Vande Mataram

4. Chhodo Kal Ki Baatein

This song is from the movie, ‘Hum Hindustani’ and provokes a feeling of being proud of the progress made by our nation since independence.

Lyrics

Chhodo kal ki baaten, kal ki baat puraani

Ne daur men likhenge, mil kar ni kahaani

Hum hindustaani, hum hindustaani

Aj puraani zanjiron ko tod chuke hain

Kya dekhen us manzil ko jo chhod chuke hain

Chaand ke dar par ja pahuncha hai aj zamana

Naye jagat se ham bhi naata jod chuke hain

Naya khoon hai, nayi umange, ab hai nayi jawaani

Hum hindustaani …

Humko kitane Taj Mahal hain aur banaane

Kitane hain Ajanta hum ko aur sajaane

Abhi palatana hai rukh kitane dariyaaon ka

Kitane parwat raahon se hain aaj hataane

Naya khoon hai, nayi umange, ab hai nayi jawaani

Hum hindustaani …

Ao mehanat ko apna imaan banaayen

Apne haathon ko apna bhagawaan banaayen

Ram ki is dharati ko Gautam ki bhoomi ko

Sapnon se bhi pyaara hindustan banaayen

Naya khoon hai, nayi umange, ab hai nayi jawaani

Hum hindustaani …

Har zarra hai moti ankh uthhaakar dekho

Maati men sona hai haath badhaakar dekho

Sone ki ye Ganga hai chaandi ki Yamuna

Chaaho to patthar se dhaan ugaakar dekho

Naya khoon hai, nayi umange, ab hai nayi jawaani

Hum hindustaani …

5. Chak De India

This song is from the movie ‘Chak De India’ and talks about being united as a country amidst diverse backgrounds.

Lyrics

Kuchh kariye, kuchh kariye

Nas nas meri khole..

Haaye kuchh kariye

[Haaye kuchh kariye

Haaye kuchh kariye]

Kuchh kariye, kuchh kariye

Bas bas bada bo de

Ab kuchh kariye

[Ab kuchh kariye

Ab kuchh kariye]

Ho.. koi to chal zid phadiye

Doobe, tariye ya mariye

Haaye.. koi to chal zid phadiye

Doobe, tariye ya mariye..

Chak de.. ho Chak de india

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Koochon mein, galion mein

Raashan ki phalion mein

Belon mein, beejon mein

Eedon mein, deejon mein

Raiton ke daanon mein

Filmon ke gaanon mein

Sadkon ke gaddhon mein

Baaton ke addon mein

Humkara aaj bhar le

Das baarah baar kar le

Rehna na yaar peechhe

Kitna bhi koi kheenche

Tas hai na, mas hai ji

Zid hai to, zid hai ji

Ghisna yun hi, ghisna yun hi

Ghisna yun hi paththar yeh… ae..

Koi to chal zid phadiye

Doobe, tariye ya mariye

Haaye.. koi to chal zid phadiye

Doobe, tariye ya mariye..

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Chak de.. chak de.. chak de.. chak de..

Ladti patangon mein

Bhidti umangon mein

Khelon ke meloan mein

Balkhaati relon mein..

Gannon ke meethe mein

Khaddar mein chheetein mein

Dhoondho to mil jaavein

Pakka woh eenton mein

Dung hai aisa aaj nikhre..

Aur khul ke aag bikhre

Man jaaye aisi holi

Rag rag mein chal ke boli

Tas hai na, mas hai ji

Zid hai to jid hai ji

Pisna yun hi, pisna yun hi

Pisna yun hi bas kariye…

Koi to chal zid phadiye

Doobe, tariye ya mariye

Haaye.. koi to chal zid phadiye

Doobe, tariye ya mariye..

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Chak de.. ho chak de India

Chak de.. ho chak de India

6. Nanha Munna Raahi Hoon

This patriotic song is from the Hindi film ‘Son of India.’ The song is an old classic and highlights how children can be the driving force behind the progress of the nation.

Lyrics

Nanha munna rahi hoon, desh ka sipahi hoon

Bolo mere sang, Jai Hind, Jai Hind, Jai Hind

Jai Hind, Jai Hind

Nanha munna rahi hoon, desh ka sipahi hoon

Bolo mere sang, Jai Hind, Jai Hind, Jai Hind

Jai Hind, Jai Hind

Raste pe chalunga na dar-dar ke

Chahe mujhe jeena pade mar-mar ke

Manzil se pehle na lunga kahin dam

Aage hi aage badhaunga kadam

Dahine baen dahine baen, tham!

Nanha munna rahi hoon……

Dhoop mein pasina me bahauga jahan

Hare-bhare khet lahraenge vahan

Dharti pe paake na paayenge janam

Aage hi aage badhaunga kadam

Dahine baen dahine baaen, tham!

Nanha munna rahi hoon……

Naya hai zamana meri nai hai dagar

Desh ko banaunga mashino ka nagar

Bharat kisi se rahega nahi kam

Aage hi aage badhaunga kadam

Dahine baen dahine baen, tham!

Nanha munna rahi hoon……

Bada ho ke desh ka sahara banoongaa

Duniya ki aankhon ka taara banoongaa

Rakhunga uncha tiranga paracham

Aage hi aage badhaunga kadam

Dahine baen dahine baen, tham!

Nanha munna rahi hoon……

Shanti ki nagari hai mera ye vatan

Sabako sikhaunga me pyaar ka chalan

Duniya mein girane na dunga kahin bam

Aage hi aage badhaunga kadam

Dahine baen dahine baen, tham!

Nanha Munna Rahi Hoon……

7. Sare Jahan se Accha

It is an Urdu patriotic song for kids, written by Muhammad Iqbal, and was published in the weekly journal Ittehad in 1904.

Lyrics

Sare jahan se accha Hindostan hamara

Hum bulbulain hai iss ki yeh gulsitan hamara

Sare jahan se accha

Ghurbat men hon agar ham rahta hai dil vatan men

Samjho vahin hamen bhi dil hain jahan hamara

Parbat voh sab se uncha hamsaya asman ka

Voh santari hamara voh pasban hamara

Godi men khelti hain is ki hazaron nadiya

Gulshan hai jin ke dam se rashk-e-janan hamara

Aye ab raud Ganga voh din hen yad tujhko

Utara tere kinare jab karvaan hamara

Mazhab nahin sikhata apas men bayr rakhna

Hindvi hai ham vatan hai Hindostan hamara

Yunan o misr o roma sab mil gaye jahan se

Ab tak magar hai baqi nam o nishan hamara

Kuch bat hai keh hasti milati nahin hamari

Sadiyon raha hai dushman daur e zaman hamara

Iqbal koi meharam apna nahin jahan men

Malum kya kisi ko dard e nihan hamara

Sare jahan se accha Hindostan hamara

Hum bulbulain hai is ki yeh gulsitan hamara

8. Mere Desh Ki Dharti

This song is from the Hindi film, ‘Upkar,’ that is dedicated to the motherland. It compares grains grown on the soil to precious gems, thus praising the richness and glory of the motherland.

Lyrics

Mere desh ki dharti…

Mere desh ki dharti, sona ugle, ugle heere moti

Mere desh ki dharti

Mere desh ki dharti

Mere desh ki dharti, sona ugle, ugle heere moti

Mere desh ki dharti

Mere desh ki dharti

Aa..aa..aa..aa..

Ho..ho..ho..ho..

Bailon ke gale mein jab ghunghru

Jeevan ka raag sunate hain

Jeevan ka raag sunate hain

Ghum kos door ho jata hai

Khushiyon ke kamal muskaate hain

Khushiyon ke kamal muskaate hain

Ho ho ….

Sun ke rahat ki aawaajein

Sun ke rahat ki aawaajein

Yun lage kahin shehnaayi baje

Yun lage kahin shehnaayi baje

Aate hi mast baharon ke

Dulhan ki tarah har khet saje

Dulhan ki tarah har khet saje

Mere desh ki dharti…

Mere desh ki dharti, sona ugle, ugle heere moti

Mere desh ki dharti

Mere desh ki dharti

Jab chalte hain is dharti pe hal

Mamta angdaiyaan leti hai

Mamta angdaiyaan leti hai

Kyon na pooje is maati ko

Jo jeevan ka sukh deti hai

Jo jeevan ka sukh deti hai

Ho ho….

Is dharti pe jisne janam liya

Is dharti pe jisne janam liya

Usne hi paya pyaar tera

Usne hi paya pyaar tera

Yahan apna paraya koi nahi

Hain sab pe maa upkaar tera

Hain sab pe maa upkaar tera

Mere desh ki dharti…

Mere desh ki dharti, sona ugle, ugle heere moti

Mere desh ki dharti

Mere desh ki dharti

Ye baag hain Gautam, Nanak ka

Khilte hain aman ke phool yahaan

Khilte hain aman ke phool yahaan

Gandhi, Subhash..

Gandhi, Subhash, Tagore, Tilak

Aise hain chaman ke phool yahaan

Aise hain chaman ke phool yahaan

Rang hara Hari Singh Nalve se

Rang laal hain Lal Bahadur se

Rang bana basanti Bhagat Singh

Rang aman ka veer Jawahar se

Mere desh ki dharti…

Mere desh ki dharti, sona ugle, ugle heere moti

Mere desh ki dharti

Mere desh ki dharti

Mere desh ki dharti, sona ugle, ugle heere moti

Mere desh ki dharti

Mere desh ki dharti

9. Aao Bachcho Tumhe Dikhaye Jhanki Hindustan Ki

It is a patriotic song for kids written by Kavi Pradeep, the famous Indian songwriter and poet. The song describes India to children through simple and playful words.

Lyrics

Aao bachcho tumhe dikhaye jhanki hindustan ki

Is mitti se tilak karo ye dharati hai balidan ki

Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram

Aao bachcho tumhe dikhaye jhanki hindustan ki

Is mitti se tilak karo ye dharati hai balidan ki

Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram

Uttar me rakhavalee karata parvataraj virat hai

Dakshin me charano ko dhota sagar kaa samrat hai

Jamuna jee ke tat ko dekho ganga kaa yeh ghat hai

Bat-bat pe hat-hat me yaha nirala thath hai

Dekho ye tasvire apane gaurav kee abhiman kee

Is mitti se tilak karo ye dharati hai balidan ki

Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram

Ye hai apna rajaputana naj ise talavaro pe

Isane sara jivan kata barachhee tir kataro pe

Yeh Pratap kaa vatan pala hai aajadee ke naaro pe

Kud padee thee yaha hajaro Padminiya angaaro pe

Bol rahee hai kan kan se kurbanee Rajasthan kee

Is mitti se tilak karo ye dharati hai balidan ki

Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram

Dekho mulk Maratho kaa yeh yaha Shivaji dola tha

Mughalo kee takat ko jisne talavaro pe tola tha

Har pavat pe aag lagi thi har patthar ek shola tha

Bolee Har Har Mahadev ki bachchaibachcha bola tha

Yaha Shivaji ne rakhi thi laj hamaree shan kee

Is mitti se tilak karo ye dharati hai balidan ki

Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram

Jaliyan Wala Bagh yeh dekho yaha chali thi goliya

Yeh mat puchho kisane khelee yaha khun ki holiya

Ek taraf banduke dan dan ek taraf thee toliya

Maranevale bol rahe the inakalab kee boliya

Yaha laga di bahano ne bhi bajee apani jan kee

Is mitti se tilak karo ye dharati hai balidan ki

Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram

Ye dekho Bangal yaha ka har chappa hariyala hai

Yaha ka bachcha-bachcha apane desh pe maranevala hai

Dhala hai isko bijali ne bhuchalo ne pala hai

Mutthi me tufan bandha hai aur pran me jvala hai

Janmabhumi hai yahi hamare vir Subhash mahan kee

Is mitti se tilak karo ye dharati hai balidan ki

Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram Vande Mataram

10. Ye Jo Des Hai Tera

It is an emotional patriotic song from the Hindi film ‘Swades.’ The song signifies how our nation loves us and always stays our true home no matter how far we drift away from it.

Lyrics

Yeh jo des hai tera, swades hai tera

Tujhe hai pukara

Yeh woh bandhan hai jo kabhi toot nahin sakta

Yeh jo des hai tera, swades hai tera

Tujhe hai pukara

Yeh woh bandhan hai jo kabhi toot nahin sakta

Mitti ki hai jo khushboo, tu kaise bhulayega

Tu chahe kahin jayeh, tu laut ke aayega

Nayee-nayee raho mein, dabi-dabi aaho mein

Khoyeh-khoyeh dil se tere koi yeh kahega

Yeh jo des hai tera, swades hai tera

Tujhe hai pukara

Yeh woh bandhan hai jo kabhi toot nahin sakta

Tujhse zindagi hai yeh kah rahi

Sab to pa liya, ab hai kya kami

Yun to sare sukh hai barse, par door tu hai apne ghar se

Aa laut chal tu ab deewane, jahan koi to tujhe apna mane

Aawaz de tujhe bulane, wohi des

Yeh jo des hai tera, swades hai tera

Tujhe hai pukara

Yeh woh bandhan hai jo kabhi toot nahin sakta

Yeh pal hai wohi, jismein hain chhupi

Poori ik sadi, sari zindagi

Tu na pooch raaste mein kahe, aaye hain is tarah dorahe

Tu hi to hai raah jo sujhayeh, tu hi to hai ab jo yeh batayeh

Jaye to kis disha mein jaye, wohi des

Yeh jo des hai tera, swades hai tera

Tujhe hai pukara

Yeh woh bandhan hai jo kabhi toot nahin sakta

11. Mile Sur Mera Tumhara

This song was first promoted by Doordarshan in 1988 and describes the sense of national integration and unity in diversity. It begins in Hindi and then continues in various Indian languages.

Lyrics

(Hindi)

Mile sur mera tumhaara, to sur bane hamaara

Sur ki nadiyaan har disha se bahate saagar mein milen

Baadalon ka roop le kar barase halke halke

Mile sur mera tumhaara, to sur bane hamaara

Mile sur mera tumhaara

(Kashmiri)

Chaain taraj tahin myan taraj

Ek wat baniye saayen taraj

(Punjabi)

Tera sur mile mere sur de naal

Milke bane ek navar surtaal

(Hindi)

Mile sur mera tumhaara, to sur bane hamaara

(Sindhi)

Muhinjo sur tuhinje saan pyaara mile jadenh

Geet asaanjo madhur taraano bane tadenh

(Urdu)

Sur ka dariya bahke saagar mein mile

(Punjabi)

Badlaan da roop leike

Barsane haule haule

(Tamil)

Isaindhal nam iruvarin suramum namadhakum

Dhisai veru aanalum aazhi ser aarugal mugilai mazaiyai pozivadu pol isai…

Nam isai

(Kannada)

Nanna dhwanige ninna dhwaniya

Seridante namma dhwaniya

(Telugu)

Naa swaramu nee swaramu sangammamai

Mana swaramga avatarinchey

(Malayalam)

Ninde swaragum ningalude swaragum

Otthucheiyum namudeya swaramai

(Bengali)

Tomaar shoor moder shoor

Shrishti koroor koi koshoor

(Assamese)

Shrishti ho koi kota

(Odia)

Toma mora swarer milan

Srishti kare chalbochatano

(Gujarati)

Male sur jo taaro maaro

Bane aapno sur niraalo

(Marathi)

Maajha tumcha julta taara

Madhur surancha barasti dhaara

(Hindi)

Sur ki nadiyaan har disha se bahate saagar mein milen

Baadalon ka roop le kar barase halke halke

Mile sur mera tumhaara

Mile sur mera tumhaara, to sur bane hamaara

To sur bane hamaara

12. Sandese Aate Hain

This song is from the Hindi film, ‘Border,’ that was based on the true-life event of the Battle of Longewala during the India-Pakistan war of 1971. The song is dedicated to the brave Indian soldiers.

Lyrics

Hoho…

Sandese aate hain, hame tadpate hain

Toh chitthee aati hai, toh puchhe jati hai

Ke ghar kab aaoge, ke ghar kab aaoge

Likho kab aaoge, kee tum bin yeh ghar suna suna hai

Kisi dilwali ne, kisi matwali ne

Hame khat likkha hai, kee hamse puchha hai

Kisi kee sanso ne, kisi kee dhadkan ne

Kisi kee chudi ne, kisi ke kangan ne

Kisi ke kajre ne, kisi ke gajre ne

Mahekti subaho ne, machalti shamo, ne

Akeli rato ne, adhuri bato ne

Tarasti baho ne, aur puchha hai tarsi nighaho ne

Ke ghar kab aaoge, ke ghar kab aaoge

Likho kab aaoge, kee tum bin yeh dil suna suna hai

Sandese aate hain, hame tadpate hain

Toh chitthee aati hai, toh puchhe jati hai

Ke ghar kab aaoge, ke ghar kab aaoge

Likho kab aaoge, kee tum bin yeh ghar suna suna hai

Mohabbatwalo ne, hamare yaro ne

Hame yeh likkha hai, ke hamse puchha hai

Hamare gao ne, aam kee chaanvo ne

Purane pipal ne, baraste badal ne

Khet khaliayano ne, hare maidano ne

Basanti belo ne, jhumti belo ne

Lachakte jhulo ne, behekte phulo ne

Chatakti kaliyo ne, aur puchha hain gao kee galiyo ne

Ke ghar kab aaoge, ke ghar kab aaoge

Likho kab aaoge, kee tum bin gaon suna suna hai

Sandese aate hain, hame tadpate hain

Toh chitthee aati hai, toh puchhe jati hai

Ke ghar kab aaoge, ke ghar kab aaoge

Likho kab aaoge, kee tum bin yeh ghar suna suna hai

Oh oh oh………….

Kabhee ek mamta kee, pyar kee ganga kee

Woh chitthee aati hai, sath woh lati hai

Mere din bachpan ke, khel woh aangan ke

14. Mera Rang De Basanti Chola

It is a patriotic song, which was written by poet and freedom fighter Ram Prasad Bismil, along with his friends. The song was popularized by the Hindi films ‘Shaheed’ and ‘The Legend of Bhagat Singh’ – both biographical films depicting the life of the freedom fighter Bhagat Singh.

These were the several Indian patriotic songs for kids that are sure to inculcate love and respect for their nation. Teaching these patriotic songs to children would also help them understand the country’s fight for independence. This selection of songs is especially suitable for school gatherings celebrating Independence Day or Republic Day. The lyrics bear a deep meaning, and your child will love singing them again and again. You may recite these songs with your children at any other time, too, to instill patriotism in their hearts.

Immerse yourself in the patriotic fervor of India with this soul-stirring collection of patriotic songs. Experience the profound emotions evoked by ‘Sare Jahan Se Acha’ and be uplifted by the indomitable spirit of our nation.
